mosinstall.description:
Bot Elxis forms generates and process HTML forms based on data stored in an XML file.
General usage: {eforms}samplecontact{/eforms}
For help and usage examples please visit eForms page at Elxis wiki.
Created by Ioannis Sannos (Is Open Source).

param.name: labelwidth
param.label: CX_EFORMS_LABW
param.description: Label width in pixels. Default value is 140.

param.name: descpos
param.label: CX_EFORMS_DESCPOS
param.description: Select where the description text to be displayed for each form element.
